name: Rock Legends: Crimson Band
short_description: Crimson Band live with a special opening act by The Electric Strings.
long_description: Witness the legendary Crimson Band live at the Grand Stage for two unforgettable nights. Featuring a special opening act by The Electric Strings, this concert brings the iconic rock sound to life for fans old and new.
return_policy_specifics: Non-refundable but transferable. Name changes allowed up to 48 hours prior.
